reviewText: Charming 1984 film about love with twist. Bit part role for very young Sean Bean but he's already at his best.

a classic film that i have been searching for some 26 years.

It was produced about the same time as i was a young soldier and the story line has very similar outcomes to my career at the time.

Superb service and delivery thanks for getting me some serious memories

N

A really great film I last saw one Christmas back when I was 19- you do the Maths!  Reece Dinsdale is just a baby then too!
Super service from a very quick seller too as this came from USA in less time than a first class letter in the UK!!!  I would definitely buy from this seller again.
Sue
